content: **more languages ** danish 1 norwegian 2 swedish 3 french 4 dutch 5 german 6 italian 7 spanish 8 polish 9 finnish 10 the arrow sweater consists of 2 identical panels the front and back each panel has 4 sections section 1-2 is crocheted in 1 piece and section 3-4 are worked individually after finishing both the front and back panel we will join the panels at the shoulders and start working the sleeves at the end the sides are joined together the pattern is available in 5 sizes from xs to xl and is written in us terms xs - 3 skeins s - 4 skeins m - 4 skeins l - 4 skeins xl - 5 skeins numbers for sizes s m l and xl are written between brackets neck line 24 cm 24 24 28 28 sleeve length 22 cm 22 24 24 25 arm hole depth 17 cm 18 20 21 23 bust width 55 cm 60 65 70 75 length 50 cm 51 52 52 53 gauge 18 double_crochet = 10 cm 10 row = 10 cm 1 https //hobbii dk/arrow-cropped-sweater
